title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Direct Volunteer Support

description.narrative: Support costs incurred for direct support of volunteers in China, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Overseas Program Support

description.narrative: Overseas program support costs in China. Includes overseas staff salaries and benefit costs, leases, staff travel, communications, conferences, supplies, equipment and International Cooperative Administrative Support Services (ICASS). Excludes costs for training, medical and security.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Medical Support

description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in China. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Pre-Service Training

description.narrative: All costs incurred for pre-Service training of volunteers in China including pre-service training in the U.S., pre-departure staging costs, and pre-service training overseas.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Safety and Security

description.narrative: Volunteer safety and security costs in China directly associated with Volunteer and staff safety (preparedness and training), and the physical security of Peace Corps-leased properties. Includes guard services, security staff, security-related travel, supplies, equipment, physical property upgrades, and the Office of Safety and Security.
